long_description: Thule Universal Flat Top 4-ski carrier has a simple-to-use design that will securely carry up to 4 pairs of skis or up to 2 snowboards. Wide, ultra-soft rubber arms provides a snug fit without scratching surfaces. 20 in. (50.8cm) wide platform holds up to 4 pairs of skis or up to 2 snowboards. Oversize push-button locking arms are easy to open and close while wearing ski gloves. Speed-Link(TM) Universal mounting hardware works with Thule rack systems, round bars and most factory-installed racks (see Fit List). Can be locked in place using Thule One-Key(TM) System lock cylinders; includes 2 keys and 4 locks (2 locks for arm assembly and 2 locks for Speed-Link mounting system).
short_description: Thule Universal Flat Top 4-ski carrier has a simple-to-use design that will securely carry up to 4 pairs of skis or up to 2 snowboards.
